items.details:
Reading

Complete the definition paper. Please use your own words, not long definitions from the dictionary. 
(Due TOMORROW)

ReadWorks Assignment 4 – Fables

I have assigned 7 fables for you to complete in ReadWorks. Please work on them over the next two weeks.

 Go to www.readworks.org/student 

Enter our class code YU6GQ2
Your password is 1234 unless you already changed it
Take your time, do your best reading, and enjoy the stories.

PLEASE TRY YOUR BEST TO LOG IN AND GIVE AN ANSWER. PLEASE DO NOT WRITE KOREAN OR WRITE ‘I DON’T KNOW’

The next story video is
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cccG9bMOfiY

Please watch the video until you fully understand

The spelling words for next week are:

preparations
magnificent 
brooded
rejoicing
satisfied
gigantic
flood
weary
darkness
politely
chest
spilled
scold
sighed
sparkling

Math

Complete Additional Practice 2-3 

Please have your child practice a little Khan Academy math each night at https://www.khanacademy.org/join/VK6QDS9E to help strengthen their skills.

Science 

Watch the patterns in motion videos
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1-Y7EfihicM 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Yg_1ddUnvmw 

Language Arts

Complete pages 21-22  in the vocabulary workshop book.(Due Thurs)

We will act out The Hare and the Tortoise on THURSDAY! (September 4th) This will be done without any papers, so please memorize your lines.
Get together with your partner to practice, add expression, and make it fun!

Social Studies

Please play the review game that will help you understand ‘land and water’

https://play.blooket.com/play?hwId=68b636db83493b08325c0494
